short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This App will keep you on task

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to keep help keep you on task. You add sites to the blacklist that you shouldn't go to and sites that are productive that you would like to go to. When you try to go to blacklisted sites, it will redirect you to a random whitelisted site.
